title: BUbreakingHeadlines
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Latest opioid settlement plan with OxyContin maker Purdue and Sackler family getting few objections
Epstein appeared to offer political advice on dealing with Trump in 2018: Emails
items.description: Jeffrey Epstein was still actively shopping his political and financial acumen with major power players on the international stage in 2018.

items.title: Suspected food poisoning kills mom, 2 kids at popular tourist site
items.description: Two children and their mother have died after eating street food at a popular Istanbul tourist site, Turkish officials said.

Shaved bald: A Rastafari fight for justice at Supreme Court
items.description: Devout Rastafarians say a case involving religious freedom behind bars highlights a history of discrimination and lack of accountability.

items.title: FDA's plan to boost cheaper copycat drugs could stall at patent office
items.description: The FDA's push for lower-cost medicines looks good on paper, but the patent office under President Trump may be going in the opposite direction.

items.title: WATCH:  First lady Melania Trump speaks at signing of 'Fostering the Future' executive order
items.description: The executive order signed Thursday focused on expanding financial and educational opportunities for young people transitioning out of foster care.

items.title: WATCH:  Former ABC News senior correspondent Jim Avila dies
items.description: Jim Avila, former ABC News senior correspondent and “20/20” correspondent, passed away after a long illness.

items.title: WATCH:  Leonardo DiCaprio eulogizes primatologist Jane Goodall
items.description: DiCaprio paid tribute to Goodall in a moving eulogy at the late environmentalist's funeral service on Wednesday.
